data.title: How do I change the name associated with my account? â€“ College Board Support
data.meta_description: The only way to change the name on your College Board account is by calling customer service at 866-315-6068.
data.text:
The only way to change the name on your College Board account is by calling customer service at 866-315-6068.

Your account name is associated with all your official College Board documents and activities, like your SAT admission ticket or viewing any of your test scores, so we need to be absolutely sure you want to change it.
